name: Gigi Douban
introduction: Her self info:I’m a journalist reporting on science, education, business, and health and fitness issues here in the U.S. and abroad. You can find my work in national and regional magazines and newspapers, or hear it on public radio.I’m a member of the Association of Independents in Radio, a 2011 Knight Journalism fellow, and I’ve been a past fellow at the University of California, Berkeley and the University of Maryland.  I travel, run, cycle, and cook. Oh, and I like birds.
